LanguageData.OGIG_Apparel_UniformShirt.label: imperial undershirt
LanguageData.OGIG_Apparel_UniformShirt.description: A uniform shirt worn by the soldiers of the IG.
LanguageData.OGIG_Apparel_CommissarJacket.description: The official coat of the Imperial Commissars.
LanguageData.OGIG_Apparel_CommissarJacket.label: Commissar Jacket
LanguageData.OGIG_Apparel_Armageddon_Uniform_Trenchco: Each Guardsman of the Armageddon Steel Legions is equipped with a toxic-resistant trenchcoat. The specially-treated gear protects a Guardsmen from the most polluted or chemically toxic environments.
LanguageData.OGIG_Apparel_Krieg_Uniform_Trenchcoat.de: Each Guardsman of the Death Korps of Krieg is equipped with a toxic-resistant trenchcoat. The specially-treated gear protects a Guardsmen from the most polluted or chemically toxic environments.\n\nPlaceholder Texture.
